attributes.action: All current MPs to be sacked and not allowed to stand for any govt office again
attributes.background:
I request that every single member of Parliament is sacked and we hold new elections after we leave the EU

The way the current lot of MPs have handled Brexit is appalling and these people have completely ignored the general population of this country

They have only worried about themselves.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs/Cabinet Ministers to be sacked. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that. 

The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
